import React from 'react' import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import products from '../../products' import Rating from './Rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { //access a single product from the products list using the high order array method //destructure by using match instead of props.match //using match in a gives us access to params const product=products.find(p=> p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Return

{product.name}

 price:â‚¬ {product.price} ) } export default ProductScreen
